solution_line_template: Out of the {total_books} books, {total_books} x {reading_fraction} = <<{total_books}*{reading_fraction}={reading_books}>>{reading_books} are reading books.

So, the total number of reading, math, and science books is {reading_books} + {math_books} + {science_books} = <<{reading_books}+{math_books}+{science_books}={total_non_history_books}>>{total_non_history_books}.
Thus, there is only {total_books} - {total_non_history_books} = <<{total_books}-{total_non_history_books}={history_books}>>{history_books} history book.
